type O O
system O O

One O O

OO O O

generally O O

that O O

I O O

are O O
finally O O
assembled O O
and O O
sent O O
out O O
in O O
scrapy/core/downloader/handlers/http11.py Name Name
in O O

( O O
https://github.com/scrapy/scrapy/blob/master/scrapy/core/downloader/handlers/http11.py#L270 O O
) O O

If O O

hook O O
there O O

can O O
dump O O
the O O
request O O
type O O
, O O

, O O
and O O

body O O
. O O

the O O
newest O O
. O O

In O O
most O O
cases O O
, O O
the O O
ArrayList Name Name
is O O

better O O

is O O

considered O O
deprecated O O
nowadays O O
. O O

As O O

difference O O
between O O
the O O

is O O

that O O
Vector Name Name
is O O

is O O

which O O
in O O
most O O

Why O O
is O O

class O O

? O O

Method O O
Definition O O
: O O

Method O O
Call O O
with O O
literal O O
value O O
of O O
0.1 Name Name
: O O

My O O
environment O O
is O O
Windows Name Name
64 Name Name
bit O O
OS O O
using O O
Qt Name Name
5.2.1 Name Name
and O O
compiling O O
using O O
Microsoft Name Name
2010 Name Name
Visual Name Name
Studio Name Name
compiler Name Name
in O O
32 O O
bit O O
. O O

Many O O
decimal O O
numbers O O
are O O
not O O
exactly O O
representable O O
in O O
IEEE O O
floating O O
point O O
( O O
i.e O O
. O O
the O O
binary O O
representation O O
used O O
for O O
double Name Name
) O O
and O O
0.1 Name Name
falls O O
in O O
this O O
camp O O
. O O

When O O
you O O
type O O
0.1 Name Name
the O O
C++ Name Name
compiler Name Name
is O O
required O O
to O O
convert O O
that O O
into O O
a O O
double Name Name
to O O
be O O
represented O O
on O O
your O O
hardware O O
. O O

It O O
does O O
so O O
by O O
computing O O
a O O
near O O
approximation O O
of O O
this O O
and O O
so O O
you O O
see O O
a O O
bit O O
of O O
error O O
. O O

If O O
you O O
try O O
something O O
like O O
a O O
power O O
of O O
two O O
: O O
0.5 Name Name
, O O
0.25 Name Name
these O O
will O O
be O O
exactly O O
represented O O
. O O

See O O
this O O
link O O
for O O
a O O
much O O
more O O
in-depth O O
description O O
of O O
the O O
idea O O
. O O

This O O
is O O
normal O O
behaviour O O
in O O
any O O
computer Name Name
. O O

It O O
's O O
caused O O
by O O
the O O
fact O O
that O O
decimal Name Name
numbers Name Name
are O O
being O O
stored O O
in O O
fixed-sized O O
binary O O
memory O O
. O O

The O O
extra O O
digits O O
come O O
from O O
the O O
inherent O O
errors O O
caused O O
by O O
converting O O
from O O
binary O O
to O O
decimal O O
. O O

You O O
will O O
not O O
get O O
rid O O
of O O
them O O
. O O

The O O
best O O
you O O
can O O
do O O
is O O
choose O O
a O O
precision O O
( O O
either O O
float Name Name
or O O

: O O

The O O

tables Name Name
are O O

: Name Name
FkOriginalTextId Name Name

Basically O O
, O O
OriginalText Name Name
will O O
have O O
key/value Name Name
pairs O O
for O O
different O O
languages O O
. O O

If O O

client Name Name

then O O

CustomText Name Name
table Name Name
. O O

An O O
example O O
would O O
be O O
OriginalText Name Name
: O O
Employee Name Name
, O O
CustomText Name Name
: O O
Staff-member Name Name
for O O
the O O
key Name Name
: O O

. O O

I O O
want O O
to O O

a O O

to O O

all O O

to O O

a O O

? O O

. O O
I O O
want O O
to O O
do O O

using O O

or O O

. O O

and O O

value O O
from O O
CustomText Name Name
if O O
exists O O
: O O

I O O
have O O
just O O
normalized O O
the O O
font Name Name
size Name Name
with O O
this O O
: O O

Now O O
I O O
would O O
like O O
to O O

tags O O

to O O

. O O

Something O O
like O O
this O O
: O O

you O O
can O O

to O O

, O O

? O O

The O O

@Profile Name Name
is O O

a O O

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Short-circuit_evaluation O O

https://developer.mozilla.org/en/JavaScript/Reference/Operators/Logical_Operators O O

: O O

registration Name Name
Id Name Name
of O O

( O O

I O O
ca O O

. O O

For O O

https://graph.facebook.com/btaylor O O
. O O

by O O

. O O

I O O
'm O O
using O O
bootstrap Name Name
with O O

. O O

the O O

.. O O
. O O

I O O
'm O O
trying O O
to O O
parse O O
a O O

with O O

The O O

of O O

form O O
" O O
if O O
segment O O
size O O
< O O
1.5 Name Name
, O O
then O O
choose O O
left O O
node O O
, O O
else O O

" O O
. O O

The O O
question O O
can O O
be O O
a O O
dictionary Name Name
with O O
a O O
key Name Name
and O O
a O O
value Name Name
. O O

The O O
left O O
and O O
right O O
node Name Name
represent O O
a O O
complete O O
left O O
or O O
right O O
half O O
tree Name Name
, O O
which O O
will O O
be O O
traversed O O
recursively O O
until O O
the O O
leaf O O
node Name Name
is O O
reached O O
. O O

In O O
this O O
manner O O
we O O
will O O
build O O
a O O
binary O O
decision O O
tree Name Name
. O O

If O O
you O O
can O O
decide O O
on O O
the O O
details O O
of O O
the O O
input O O
format O O
, O O
then O O
use O O

python Name Name
source O O
code O O
. O O

For O O
example O O

can O O

in O O

of O O

: O O

Now O O
you O O
can O O

simply O O
with O O

parser O O
. O O

Well O O
, O O
if O O

input O O
format O O
is O O
already O O
specified O O

format O O
. O O

This O O
kind O O
of O O
syntax O O
is O O
really O O
the O O
target O O
for O O
pyparsing Name Name
. O O

The O O
basic O O
format O O
is O O
simple O O
enough O O
, O O
and O O
in O O
pyparsing Name Name
, O O

looks O O
like O O
: O O

But O O
once O O
you O O

to O O
add O O

and O O

and O O
support O O
for O O
' O O
and Name Name
' O O
and O O
' O O
or Name Name
' O O
operators O O
, O O
things O O
get O O
complicated O O
. O O

Also O O
, O O

is O O
a O O

grammar O O
, O O
since O O
an O O

can O O
itself O O

. O O

Pyparsing Name Name
has O O
built-in O O
support O O
that O O
simplifies O O
definition O O
of O O
arithmetic O O
and O O
boolean Name Name
expressions O O
, O O
including O O
precedence O O
of O O
operations O O
and O O

plus O O
recursive O O

. O O

Here O O
is O O

pyparsing Name Name

in O O
various O O
pieces O O
. O O

First O O
here O O
are O O
some O O
of O O

basic O O

: O O

The O O
parse O O
action O O
attached O O
to O O
the O O
number O O
expression O O
will O O
automatically O O
convert O O
the O O
parsed O O
number O O
to O O
a O O
float Name Name
value O O
at O O
parse O O
time O O
. O O

The O O
Word Name Name
class O O
takes O O
two O O
strings Name Name
: O O
a O O
string Name Name
containing O O
all O O
valid O O
leading O O
characters O O
, O O
and O O
a O O
string Name Name
of O O
all O O
valid O O

characters O O
. O O

This O O
varname Name Name
definition O O
supports O O
variable O O
names O O
similar O O
to O O

identifiers O O
. O O

Pyparsing Name Name
has O O
the O O
operatorPrecedence Name Name
method O O
that O O
takes O O
an O O
expression O O
for O O
the O O
basic O O
operand O O
definition O O
, O O
and O O

of O O

of O O
operators O O
: O O
an O O
expression O O
for O O
the O O
operators O O

an O O
integer Name Name
whether O O

is O O
unary O O

, O O
or O O
ternary O O
, O O
and O O
whether O O
left O O

operatorPrecedence O O
takes O O
care O O
of O O
the O O
recursive O O
definition O O
of O O

expressions O O
nested O O

This O O
expression O O

basic O O
4-function O O
math O O
: O O

Now O O

is O O

of O O

Your O O

of O O

was O O

These O O

" Name Name

Problem O O
: O O

I O O
want O O
to O O
use O O
a O O
different O O
size O O
scale O O
for O O
edges Name Name
and O O
nodes Name Name
in O O

network Name Name
created O O
with O O
the O O

package O O
. O O

If O O

image Name Name
below O O

may O O

already O O
did O O
that O O
since O O
they O O
all O O

different O O
sizes O O
but O O
in O O
fact O O
edge Name Name
and O O
node Name Name
size O O
are O O
not O O
scaled O O
independently O O
in O O
this O O
plot Name Name
. O O

They O O
are O O
both O O
scaled O O
by O O
the O O
scale_size_area() Name Name
function O O
towards O O
the O O
same O O
maximum O O
( O O
30 Name Name
) O O
. O O

If O O
I O O
get O O
larger O O
nodes O O
my O O
edges O O
will O O
shrink O O
. O O

I O O
guess O O
my O O
problem O O
boils O O
down O O
to O O
scaling O O
the O O
size O O
of O O
different O O
geoms O O
with O O
different O O
functions O O
. O O

So O O
for O O
example O O
how O O
can O O
I O O
scale O O
the O O
size O O
of O O
the O O
nodes O O
with O O
scale_size_area Name Name
( Name Name
max_size Name Name
= Name Name
30 Name O
) Name Name

My O O
question O O
is O O
: O O
Which O O
is O O
better O O
between O O
using O O
NotificationCenter Name Name
and O O
using O O
Closures O O
to O O
communicate O O
between O O
two O O
instances O O
? O O

If O O
they O O
are O O
similar O O
, O O
what O O
should O O
I O O
use O O
? O O

, O O

to O O
understand O O
better O O
: O O
- O O

If O O
we O O
take O O
URLSession Name Name
class O O
as O O
an O O
example O O
. O O

Why O O
do O O
most O O
of O O
its O O
methods O O
have O O
a O O
closure O O
? O O

Why O O
do O O
not O O
they O O
send O O
a O O
notification O O
with O O
Data Name Name
, O O
Response Name Name
, O O
and O O
Error Name Name
inside O O
it O O
? O O

I O O
know O O
the O O
difference O O
between O O
them O O
, O O
I O O
just O O
do O O
n't O O
know O O
in O O
what O O
situations O O
should O O
I O O
use O O
each O O
one O O
. O O

In O O
some O O
cases O O
the O O
patterns O O
are O O
interchangeable O O
, O O
however O O
: O O

Using O O
a O O
closure O O
is O O
the O O
simplest O O
solution O O
for O O
simple O O
cases O O

Using O O
a O O
delegate O O
is O O
common O O
when O O
there O O
is O O
complex O O
communication O O
between O O
two O O
objects O O
. O O

One O O
delegate O O
can O O
be O O
better O O
than O O
many O O
closures O O
. O O

You O O
have O O
to O O
use O O
notifications O O
when O O
you O O
have O O
multiple O O
observers O O
or O O
when O O
you O O
are O O
not O O
sure O O
what O O
objects O O
will O O
be O O
observing O O
. O O

You O O
might O O
be O O
asking O O
yourself O O
why O O
we O O
are O O
using O O
closures O O
for O O
simple O O
cases O O
and O O
not O O
delegates O O
or O O
notifications O O
. O O

The O O
answer O O
is O O
that O O
closures O O
are O O
the O O
most O O
lightweight O O
. O O

They O O
are O O
easy O O
to O O
create O O
and O O
they O O
positively O O
affect O O
your O O
code O O
quality O O
. O O

Let O O
's O O
consider O O
a O O
completion O O
callback O O
. O O

If O O
you O O
decide O O
to O O
use O O
a O O
notification O O
, O O
you O O
need O O
another O O
method O O
that O O
will O O
handle O O
that O O
notification O O
. O O

The O O
same O O
is O O
valid O O
for O O
delegates O O
. O O

If O O
you O O
need O O
some O O
context O O
( O O
e.g O O
. O O
the O O
parameters O O
that O O
triggered O O
the O O
actions O O
) O O
, O O
you O O
will O O
need O O
to O O
save O O
it O O
into O O
a O O
property O O
. O O

On O O
the O O
other O O
hand O O
, O O
a O O
closure O O
can O O
be O O
created O O
inline O O
. O O

That O O
means O O
that O O
the O O
code O O
that O O
triggers O O
the O O
action O O
and O O
handles O O
its O O
result O O
is O O
at O O
one O O
place O O
. O O

This O O
really O O
simplifies O O
the O O
structure O O
of O O
your O O
code O O
. O O

Also O O
note O O
that O O
if O O
the O O
closure O O
needs O O
some O O
context O O
, O O
it O O
can O O
capture O O
it O O
, O O
without O O
the O O
need O O
to O O
create O O
an O O
additional O O
property O O
. O O

) O O

Original O O
: O O

I O O

One O O

I O O

between O O
the O O
Memento Name Name
Pattern Name Name
and O O
Serialization O O
. O O

From O O
what O O
I O O
can O O
gather O O
both O O
can O O

to O O

in O O

some O O
light O O
on O O
what O O
the O O
differences O O
are O O
between O O
the O O
two O O
. O O

Thanks O O

Typically O O
the O O
Memento Name Name
pattern Name Name
is O O
used O O
to O O
implement O O
roll-back/save O O
point O O
support O O
. O O

For O O
example O O
I O O
might O O
want O O
to O O
mark O O
the O O
state O O
of O O
an O O
object O O
at O O
a O O
point O O
in O O
time O O
, O O
do O O
some O O
work O O
and O O
then O O
decide O O
to O O
revert O O
that O O
object O O
back O O
to O O
the O O
point O O
at O O
which O O
is O O
was O O
marked O O
. O O

The O O
implementation O O
of O O
a O O
Memento Name Name
pattern Name Name
could O O
use O O
serialisation O O
, O O
which O O
would O O
involve O O
saving O O
the O O
contents O O
of O O
the O O
object O O
into O O
a O O
byte[] Name Name
and O O
keeping O O
in O O
memory O O
or O O
writing O O
to O O
disk Name Name
. O O

When O O
reverting O O
the O O
content O O
of O O
the O O
object O O
would O O
be O O
rebuilt O O

Imagine O O
a O O

with O O
a O O

I O O
have O O

clients O O

can O O

through O O

. O O

client O O

will O O

to O O

to O O

Can O O

an O O
algorithm O O
? O O

To O O
do O O
this O O
: O O

I O O
have O O
2 O O

that O O
write O O
out O O
to O O
two O O
separate O O
files O O
, O O
and O O
the O O
amount O O
of O O

down O O

a O O

: O O

've O O

not O O
change O O

. O O

" O O

only O O

, O O
which O O
is O O
just O O
a O O
level O O
+ O O

. O O

My O O
traces O O
have O O
much O O
more O O

which O O
ca O O

in O O

" O O

. O O

e.gr O O
. O O

What O O
's O O
the O O
rationale O O
supporting O O
that O O
convention O O
? O O

The O O
Microsoft Name Name
Guidelines O O
for O O
member O O
naming O O
specifies O O
that O O
you O O
do O O
not O O
use O O
prefixes O O
for O O
fields O O
. O O

You O O
can O O
read O O
Microsoft Name Name
's O O
guidelines O O
for O O
names O O
here O O
. O O

This O O
just O O
applies O O
to O O
C# Name Name
, O O
of O O
course O O
. O O

In O O
C# Name Name
I O O
usually O O
prefix O O
with O O
_ Name Name
private O O
fields O O
but O O
never O O
local O O
variables O O
. O O

The O O
rationale O O
behind O O
this O O
is O O
that O O
when O O
I O O
need O O
a O O
private O O
variable O O
I O O
type O O
_ Name Name
and O O
the O O
Intellisense Name Name
filters O O
the O O
list O O
and O O
it O O
is O O
easier O O
to O O
find O O
. O O

This O O
way O O
I O O
am O O
also O O
able O O
to O O
distinguish O O
between O O
private O O
from O O
local O O
variables O O
and O O
I O O
no O O
longer O O
need O O
to O O
type O O
this.variablename Name Name
for O O
class O O
fields O O
but O O
simply O O
_variablename Name Name
. O O

I O O
want O O
to O O
show O O
a O O
note/label Name Name
on O O
my O O
tableview Name Name

there O O
is O O
no O O
data O O
to O O
load O O
, O O
or O O
data O O
is O O
being O O
fetched O O
etc O O
. O O

I O O
ca O O
n't O O
see O O
what O O
am O O
I O O
doing O O
wrong O O
here O O
. O O

Xcode Name Name
is O O
showing O O
a O O
warning O O
" O O

is O O
just O O
so O O
damn O O

that O O

can O O
be O O

to O O
debug O O
when O O

The O O
.Single() Name Name
is O O
what O O
's O O
throwing O O
the O O
exception Name Name
. O O

Either O O
your O O
query O O
is O O
returning O O
no O O
items O O

's O O
returning O O
> O O
1 O O
item O O
. O O

If O O
you O O
're O O
not O O
sure O O
of O O

number O O
of O O
items O O
you O O
're O O
expecting O O

you O O
should O O
be O O
using O O
FirstOrDefault() Name Name
which O O
will O O
return O O
the O O
first O O
match O O
or O O
null Name Name
if O O
no O O
matches O O
are O O
found O O
. O O

The O O
non-LINQ Name Name
equivalent O O
is O O
something O O
like O O

row Name Name

I O O

( O O

is O O

to O O

equality O O

By O O

to O O

the O O
two O O
objects O O
to O O

type O O
that O O
does O O
know O O

. O O

For O O

, O O

to O O

to O O

: O O

will O O

call O O
: O O

IOW O O
: O O
it O O
will O O
call O O

with O O

equivalent O O
of O O

to O O

, Name Name

a Name Name

has O O
four O O

of O O
object O O
equivalence O O
: O O

? Name Name
– O O
same O O
object O O

? Name Name
– O O
highest O O
level O O
of O O
equivalence O O
below O O
same O O
object O O

== Name Name
– O O
" O O
standard O O
" O O
equality O O

# Name Name
== Name Name
= Name O
, O O

= Name Name

, O O

, O O
etc O O

– O O
loose O O
equivalence O O
, O O
" O O
same O O
group O O
" O O
equivalence O O

Mindful O O

of O O

and O O

to O O

option O O

to O O
operate O O

( O O

does O O

. O O

option O O

If O O

you O O
need O O
to O O
do O O
is O O
read O O
and O O
write O O
it O O
then O O
std::string Name Name
is O O
fine O O
. O O

This O O
works O O
because O O
no O O
multi-character O O
UTF O O
codepoint O O
overlaps O O
with O O
an O O
an O O
ASCII O O
character O O
so O O
the O O
standard O O
processing O O
of O O
text O O
works O O
just O O
fine O O
in O O
relation O O
to O O
end O O
of O O
line O O
sequence O O
and O O
there O O
is O O
no O O
other O O
processing O O
done O O
by O O

stream O O
. O O

What O O
you O O

is O O
what O O
you O O
get O O
. O O

Outputting O O
the O O
string Name Name
does O O
not O O
change O O
any O O
of O O
the O O
codepoints O O
. O O

Now O O
if O O
you O O
need O O
to O O
manipulate O O
the O O
text O O
that O O
is O O
a O O
different O O
question O O
and O O
gets O O
more O O
complex O O
. O O

Usually O O
manipulating O O
UTF-8 O O
is O O
way O O
to O O
hard O O
( O O
can O O
be O O
done O O
but O O
not O O
worth O O
it O O
IMO O O
) O O
. O O

When O O
it O O
comes O O
to O O
manipulating O O
the O O
text O O
you O O
want O O
to O O
convert O O
the O O
UTF-8 O O
( O O
which O O
is O O
not O O
a O O
fixed O O
width O O
) O O
to O O
an O O
internal O O
fixed O O
width O O
format O O
; O O
( O O
UTF-16 O O
or O O
UTF-32 O O
are O O
common O O
formats O O
for O O
manipulation O O
and O O
easy O O
to O O
use O O
; O O
( O O
UTF-16 O O
windows Name Name
, O O
UTF-32 O O
for O O
most O O
* Name Name
nix Name Name
like O O
OS O O
) O O
) O O
. O O

The O O
easiest O O
way O O
to O O
do O O
this O O
is O O
to O O
imbue O O
the O O
stream O O
with O O
a O O
facet O O
that O O
knows O O
the O O
input O O
is O O
in O O
UTF-8 O O
and O O
will O O
convert O O
it O O
automatically O O
. O O

There O O
are O O
a O O
couple O O
of O O
these O O
facets O O
floating O O
around O O
in O O
different O O
libraries O O
. O O

But O O
an O O
easy O O
one O O
to O O
find O O
is O O
boost O O
: O O

http://www.boost.org/doc/libs/1_38_0/libs/serialization/doc/codecvt.html O O

Note O O
: O O
It O O
is O O
also O O
in O O
the O O
latest O O
version O O
of O O
boost Name Name
1.46 Name Name

The O O
processes O O
is O O
the O O
same O O
for O O
writting O O
UTF-16/32 O O
back O O
to O O
